entries.name: after_resolution()
entries.desc: Called after resolution ends (either successfully or with an error). By default, prints a newline.

entries.name: debug(depth = 0)
entries.desc: Conveys debug information to the user.

entries.name: debug?()
entries.desc: Whether or not debug messages should be printed. By default, whether or not the `MOLINILLO_DEBUG` environment variable is set.

entries.name: indicate_progress()
entries.desc: Called roughly every {#progress_rate}, this method should convey progress to the user.

entries.name: output()
entries.desc: The {IO} object that should be used to print output. `STDOUT`, by default.

entries.name: progress_rate()
entries.desc: How often progress should be conveyed to the user via {#indicate_progress}, in seconds. A third of a second, by default.
